text: Rhea Durham (born July 1, 1978) is an American model. She has appeared on the cover of several major fashion magazines, including French Vogue, Marie Claire, British and American ELLE. Rhea has also walked in the 2000 and 2001 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show. She guest-starred as herself on the 2001 Spin City episode, "The Wedding Scammer." ==Personal life== Rhea started a relationship with actor Mark Wahlberg in 2001. They have four children: daughters Ella Rae (b. 2003) and Grace Margaret (b. 2010), and sons Michael (b. 2006) and Brendan Joseph (b. 2008). They got married on August 1, 2009 in a private Catholic ceremony in Beverly Hills, California. In 2009, she converted to Catholicism from Baptist Protestantism, having received the sacraments of initiation. ==References== ==External links== * * *Rhea Durham at AskMen.com Category:1978 births Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Catholics from Florida Category:Converts to Roman Catholicism from Baptist denominations Category:Female models from Florida Category:Former Baptists Category:Living people Category:People from Lakeland, Florida Category:Wahlberg family
title: Rhea Durham
